item.description:
[Update]
What if you could use the best-of-breed solution for constituent relationship management (CRM) with Plone? Now you can! We are excited to have guest speaker Andrew Burkhalter, from ONE/Northwest, demo and talk about Plone + Salesforce.com integration. If there's time afterwards, I'll demo Microsoft Windows desktop integration with Plone using Enfold Desktop.
[End Update]

Did you know that Plone has hundreds (837 at last count) of add on products that give Plone even more super powers? Things like animated slideshows, Microsoft Windows desktop integration, newsletters, and more.

Come and find out about some of the "must-have" add-on products for Plone!

Location: http://tinyurl.com/28... [googlemap]
The Betahouse entrance is the first door in the brick building and is just a couple blocks west of Mass Ave in Central Square, Cambridge, MA.
item.name: The Boston Plone August Meetup
